options.name: Physical Conditioning
options.description: You have developed exceptional physical fitness through dedicated training. Gain +1 skill with fitness and +1 health.

options.name: Endurance Training
options.description: Your body has been conditioned to endure physical stress. Gain +1 skill with endurance. You can hold your breath for twice as long.

options.name: Natural Athlete
options.description: Your coordination and agility are exceptional. Gain +1 skill with coordination and +1 movement speed.

options.name: Daily Action : Second Wind
options.description: You dig deep to find reserves of energy when exhausted. Remove the winded condition, restore your energy completely and gain 2d4 morale that lasts for a minute.

options.name: Action : Run and Jump
options.description: You take an enhanced sprint action, moving up to double your movement speed and then making a leap equal to your maximum jump distance at the end of your movement.

options.name: Reaction : Athletic Reflexes
options.description: In response to being targeted by an attack that you could normally block or deflect, you can instead use your athletic ability to avoid the attack. Make a fitness check in place of your normal deflection or evasion check, with a success meaning you avoid any damage.

options.name: Mind-Body Connection
options.description: Your dedication to your body has resulted in a stronger willpower. Gain +1 resilience and +1 maximum energy.

options.name: Precision Thrower
options.description: Your training has perfected your throwing technique. Gain +1 skill with throwing weapons.

options.name: Powerful Build
options.description: Your physical strength has reached impressive levels. Gain +1 skill with might and +2 health.

options.name: Legendary Athlete
options.description: You have achieved legendary status in physical performance and the results are there for all to see. Gain +1 skill with fitness and +1 skill to presence. When competing in an athletic competition, roll a bonus dice to any physique or finesse checks.
